root.name: Super Robot Wars Compact 2 Part 2: Cosmoquake
root.description: Overview Super Robot Wars Compact 2 was the second Super Robot Wars strategy RPG to be released on the WonderSwan. Like Super Robot Wars F/ F Final before it, Compact 2 is split into multiple parts: Part 1 and Part 2 occur simultaneously, while Part 3 continues from Part 2. Using the WonderSwan's internal memory, players can send their clear data to each successive game; several events are altered based on the player's previous save, gained items are carried over to Part 3, and a special final scenario can be unlocked by clearing the entire trilogy within 777 turns. The game, like its predecessor, borrows almost all of its gameplay mechanics from F/F Final; however, it introduces the "Support System" which immediately became a core mechanic of the SRW franchise. Earth Crisis introduces Ninja Senshi Tobikage and Hyper Combat Unit Dangaioh, while Cosmoquake features the debut of Machine Robo: Revenge of Cronos. The entirety of Compact 2 was remade into Super Robot Wars Impact for the PlayStation 2.Featured Series A list of the anime series which are featured in the game. Series that premiered in the Super Robot Wars series in this game are marked with "(new)". Special Note: As the events of SRW Compact 2-1 and Compact 2-2 occur simultaneously, many robots will appear in a game, only to later disappear from the roster completely; therefore, this list only covers units that are available at the end of the game. For a more complete series list, see SRW Compact 2-3 or Super Robot Wars Impact. Mobile Suit Gundam Mobile Suit Gundam 0083: Stardust Memory Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam Mobile Suit Gundam ZZ Mobile Suit Gundam F91 Mazinger Z* Great Mazinger* UFO Robo Grendizer Brave Raideen Invincible Super Man Zambot 3 Invincible Steel Man Daitarn 3 Super Beast Machine God Dancougar Machine Robo: Revenge of Chronos (new) Banpresto Originals (Original characters created for the game) *Depends on a choice that the player makes in SRW Compact 2-1.
